评论详情: Great price, not too thick or thin, very comfortable.  Looks and fits great. Sizes up for better oversized fit. Color and style are good. The green numbers are a little plastic-like, but not shiny or very noticeable. Washed several times and it is still in great shape!
I bought the 12 from free people and spent free people money. Once I found this dupe I was pumped. It is exactly the same. I love the price and fit of this shirt.
Not what it looks like in the photo. There is weird red paint design on some of it. The material is very poor quality and it took forever to ship. Cheap Chinese product that Amazon is known for.
Received as a gift, does not have an oversized fit

The item was as described but did not fit well at all. I'm trying to do a return and it says it has been refunded BUT there's no return label to print and no QR code to scan at UPS drop off so I'm confused how to get it back and I can't email the seller either.
The material was not a good quality. The print was horrible and appeared to be smeared on the nutcracker.
I have gotten many compliments on this sweatshirt. It’s unique and comfy. The colors are vibrant and it can be dressed up or worn with jeans!
I do not the looks of this. The seams are pronounced and seem to be in weird places. Looks much better in the picture!
It’s okay I like the cut and the weight but it is definitely not a burnt red or brown eagle it’s a bright red decal and looks ironed on.
Perfect shirt for the fall time it’s not too heavy, not too light.  Looks a little freeish, but not the price
Great quality
Did not like this.  Arms were to long and didn’t like that it was like felt material.
Pretty close to a free people dupe. It’s not super oversized but oversized enough for me. I usually wear a medium, but I ordered a large and I think it’s perfect!

评论详情: It is not the exact same. I have the actual New York pull-over by Free People in the size XL and that thing was oversized and it was amazing! I ordered the apricot bison one and the material is great but it is not as over-sized especially since I did purchase the XL. It fits perfectly just not oversized. Not terrible but ofc much rather have the Free People but not a terrible dupe.

I really like this sweatshirt. Fit is perfect. It’s oversized but not to much.

评论概述: This runs much smaller than the Free People version
评论详情: I have the Free People version in a small, I wish I’d ordered this dupe sweatshirt in a medium or even large. I have to pay for shipping to return/exchange this item even though I’m a Prime member. Not worth the cost given the price of the sweatshirt. If I’d known this I wouldn’t have risked it by ordering.
Good quality for price and is such a good FP lookalike! Def recommend and sizing up for an oversized look!
Perfection 🌴🌴

After reading the previous review I expected an awful shirt. Happily it’s great for the money . Of course the 100 dollar version is better but this is darn good. I’ll buy other graphics . I usually wear M. This is XL and not too large.
